articles.author: David W Cerny, Radovan Stoklasa, Marek Strzelecki
articles.title: Floods claim more lives as torrential rain pounds central Europe - Reuters
articles.description: Some parts of the Czech Republic and Poland faced their worst flooding in almost three decades.
articles.content: JESENIK, Czech Republic/WARSAW, Sept 15 (Reuters) - The death toll from flooding in central Europe rose to eight on Sunday as thousands of people were evacuated from their homes in the Czech Republic… [+3695 chars]
